letters.description: Identify the current autonomic state—ventral, sympathetic, or dorsal—through interoceptive scanning and physiological awareness.
Map the specific neuroceptive triggers and environmental cues that drive the individual's unique patterns of dysregulation.
Apply somatic interventions and bottom-up techniques to discharge survival energy and release physiological bracing.
Anchor the system in a state of felt safety, establishing a reliable ventral vagal baseline and physiological homeostasis.
Build vagal tone and neuroplasticity to increase the window of tolerance and enhance long-term emotional resilience.
